pasta: Add pasta and cook for ten minutes.
Add tomato sauce and mix well.
Serve hot and enjoy your meal.
tea: Add milk and bring to a boil.
maggi: Boil one and a half cups of water.
Cook for two minutes while stirring.
Turn off heat and let it sit for a minute.
omelette: Crack two eggs in a bowl.
Add salt, pepper, and chopped onions.
Heat a pan with some oil.
Pour the mixture and cook both sides.
poha: Rinse poha in a strainer and keep aside.
Heat oil in a pan and add mustard seeds.
Add chopped onions, green chili, and curry leaves.
Add turmeric and salt, then mix in poha.
Cook for 2â€“3 minutes and serve with lemon juice.
sandwich: Add sliced cucumber, tomato, and cheese.
dal: Boil with turmeric and salt until soft.
In another pan, heat oil and add mustard seeds, garlic, and chili.
Pour the tempering over the dal.
Simmer for 5 minutes and serve hot with rice.
rice: Rinse one cup of rice in water.
Add two cups of water in a pot.
Add the rinsed rice and a pinch of salt.
Bring to a boil and then simmer on low flame.
Cook until water is absorbed and rice is fluffy.
chai: Pour one cup water into a pan.
Add one teaspoon tea leaves and sugar to taste.
Add half cup milk and boil again.
Strain into a cup and serve hot.
upma: Dry roast semolina in a pan and keep aside.
Heat oil and add mustard seeds and urad dal.
Add chopped onions, chilies, and curry leaves.
Add two cups of water and bring to boil.
Cook until thick and fluffy. Serve hot.
